song.englishname: The End Is Where We Begin

english.segment1: [Verse 1:]. I'm an alien. Cuz I'm not of this world. I have a name. but I've been changed, and now I can't stay the same. and I'm a loser if that means I've been lost before. but now I found it, I'm surrounded. Cuz you can hear the way it sounded
english.segment2: [Pre-Chorus]. Like angels singing with a million voices
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. The end is where we begin. It's crawling back when. We run away, run away. cuz the end is where we begin. Where broken hearts mend. and start to beat again. The end is where we begin
english.segment4: [Verse 2:]. I'm a monster if that means I'm misunderstood. Cuz its alive and I can't hide it. The energy is rising. and I'm a traitor if that means I've turned on myself. I can't deny it, it's like a riot. and I can't keep it quiet
english.segment5: [Pre-Chorus]. Like angels singing with a million voices
english.segment6: [Chorus:]. The end is where we begin. It's crawling back when. We run away, run away. Cuz the end is where we begin. Where broken hearts mend. and start to beat again. The end is where we begin
english.segment7: [Bridge:]. Hear me running. Hear me running, running. Hear me running, hear me running, ra-running. Hear me running, hear me
english.segment8: [Chorus:]. The end is where we begin. It's crawling back when. We run away, run away. Cuz the end is where we begin. Where broken hearts mend. and start to beat again
english.segment9: The end is where we begin. It's crawling back when. We run away, run away. Cuz the end is where we begin. Where broken hearts mend. and start to beat again. The end is where we begin
